reviewText: One of my favorite artists, i just exspected a little more from him. It was just a little too somber for me. Afraid i gave this one away.

reviewText: I really enjoyed this DVD. I'm new to Howard Hewett's music and Shalamar and this dvd showed me that that man has skill as a singer, songwriter and composer.I love the Shalamar medley!  "Night To Remember was performed great on the dvd, eventhough he tried to sing Jody's part, lol.Hat off to Howard!

reviewText: Howard was fantasty, his voice was as tender as expected,I was not disappointed, very sexy,as well as soulful. This viedo has prompted me to invest in more of his music.
Title: N/A

reviewText: howard hewett sounds very good on this performance in LA at a intimate club. he sings his solo hits and the shalamar hits as well. the band is tight as well,but it is howard's vocals that still is so moving and soulful. he talks about growing up in ohio and what he use to groove to when he was rolling in his ride.the bonus material is tight as well with Howard doing a cut with Stanley Clarke and George Duke playing with him.then Howard and James Ingram do a few vocal runs and talk about back in the day.  very soulful.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Great Howard Hewett dvd, he leaves out nothing on this dvd. He even takes you to church. I refer every man or woman to order this dvd and let Howard Hewett sing to you.
summary: Howard Hewett - Intimate - Greatest Hits Live
